credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Charles T. Cook
dimensions:
Overall: 3 1/2 x 1 3/4 in. (8.9 x 4.5 cm)
rim: 1 1/4 in. (3.2 cm)
title: Tall-necked Unguentarium
description: Colorless (grey-green tinge) fairly thick glass. Small, bulbous body with tall, narrow, tubular neck which widens slightly towards rim. Concave base with faint pontil-mark. Blow-marks, stretched bubbles. Incrustation inside.
